name: Spellbound (itch) (gnashley)
description:
Slay enemies, upgrade your weapons, and grow in power as you prepare to face the truth behind the curse that threatens the life of your loved one.

Spellbound is a game project made by Nelson Ly, Denis Zuniga, and David Zatopek.

Credits:

Music by: Patrick de Arteaga  from patrickdearteaga.com

Fonts by:  Dieter Steffman

Sound effects by:  Daniel Simon

David - Game and art direction, project planning, programming

Denis - Environment art,  enemy art and animation, prop art, level design

Nelson - Character art and animation, Illustration,  prop art, UI design
